name: Low Health
description:
Who says losing HP has to be a bad thing?

Low Health is a game where you'll have to lose lives to make progress. You'll push your HP around in the game world to solve simple puzzles, while trying not to die from deadly spikes!

This game is a submission to WOWIE Game Jam 3. It would be highly appreciated if you could give it a score and rating in the jam.

Note: This game was NOT made in a team.

Hope you enjoy!       :)
